mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board(ICODE, IADMIN, TITLE, CONTENTS) VALUES(#{icode}, '1', #{title}, #{contents})
mapper.select: SELECT IBOARD, ICODE, TITLE, CREATED_AT FROM tbl_board WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE IBOARD = #{iboard}
